fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, perform surgery on a player, healing them (same as doctor). You can't perform surgery on yourself.
- If a player you're healing gets attacked, you powerfully rampage at the house, attacking all players there.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Since your rampage and your heal have the same strength, you won't kill your target unless their defense lowers somehow.
